FuncDef:
The mru statistic enable command enables an interface to collect MRU-based packet loss statistics.
The undo mru statistic enable command disables an interface from collecting MRU-based packet loss statistics.
By default, an interface is disabled from collecting MRU-based packet loss statistics.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
An MRU-configured interface discards packets if the size of the received packets is longer than the interface MRU. Before checking MRU-based packet loss statistics on an interface, run the mru statistic enable command to enable the interface to collect MRU-based packet loss statistics.
Prerequisites
The maximum receive unit (MRU) for an interface has been enabled using the mru command.
